page.title: 14INDUSTRY-2
page.content:
The other employment sources in the area are farming and forestry. The latter is quite a recent development in the valley. When the opencast site has been restored it seems likely that it too will be planted with conifers as part of Kyle Forest.
On the southern slope above the mouth of the valley there is a small factory run by the Carrington-Vyella Group. Located on the northern outskirts of Dalmellington it is used as a training unit for operatives in the main factory in the town centre. The main product of the firm from these two units is ladies' and children's clothing.
